website_summaries.verdict: Users say the product lives up to its claims, but you have to take 3 capsules per serving.
pros: Contains known precursors to nitric oxide as well as L-citrulline and grapeseed extract, which are thought to help raise nitric oxide levels
Enhances blood flow to muscles and endurance
cons: You must take 3 capsules per  serving, so one bottle is only a 30-day supply

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately like most Nitric Oxide products
customer_reviews.text: It works. Gives you the pump. Unfortunately like most Nitric Oxide products, the pump only lasts maybe the first 30-40 min. But maybe that's all you need! I actually prefer Performix Pump. It works twice as hard and lasts for a few hours, sometimes on a good day it feels like it lasts half the day. But Performix products are expensive. So I buy this No3 Chrome to alternate with so I don't use up the Performix Pump so fast. You need the pump to get you to work harder and be motivated at the gym. You know that feeling when your shirt tightens at the gym.....OOOoh!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good when you're on E
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to be on a completely empty stomach when you take this. I am very sensitive to pre-workouts, but I do take Amino Pump (by ON). Any stimulants usually make me feel drained and cause some G.I. discomfort, but these did not. I will say, though, I have had similar results from just taking agmatine alone. This product does provide a nice pump and some good energy when taking it on an empty stomach, but even just a little bit of food drowns the effects. This is a problem since I need to constantly eat. Its good for its usage, but too sensitive. I'll just take my own blend in the future.
customer_reviews.author: ECop

customer_reviews.title: Nitric oxide

customer_reviews.title: I did not have any bad side effects using this product

I'm sure it works for other people: judging by the popular reviews: but it just did nothing for me and my workouts. I'm going to try a different brand to see if they work for me. I did not have any bad side effects using this product, just simply didn't work.

CELLUCOR is way above many other brands

customer_reviews.title: I have only tried pre-workout supplements in the past such ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only tried pre-workout supplements in the past such as C4 and NO Explode. This product DOES enhance bloodflow FOR ME (YOUR RESULTS MAY VARY), but I can feel a stronger pump during workouts where I take this beforehand. If you are looking for that "Pump Amplifier" as this product is labelled. Look no further. I just wish this product was less expensive. 90 capsules is only a 30 day supply so it's about $1.00 per serving and that is quite high.

I was getting light headed with just taking Mr. Hyde on its own since the caffeine was so high (350mg). So the Nitric Oxide helped with blood flow and allowed me to stay focused throughout my workout. Just make sure it is taken about 20min before your preworkout.

I had used this product some years ago and always had excellent results. I suggest all new comers to the product READ the label and FOLLOW the INSTRUCTIONS. product_meta.title: Cellucor NO3 Chrome Nitric Oxide Supplements with Arginine Nitrate for Muscle Pump & Blood Flow, 90 Capsules, G4
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Capsules| Size:90 Count (Pack of 1)Nitric Oxide supplements have been the weapon of choice for maximizing the pump. Essentially, nitric oxide helps promote blood flow to the muscles, which in turn supports a better pump. NO3 chrome utilizes NO3 in the form of arginine Nitrate Fusion of L-Arginine and Nitrate. Combining these two efficient and powerful ingredients Helps give you the long lasting, unbelievable pumps to help your muscle gains.

no3 chrome has been the pump product for years, and to keep raising the bar we've explored new ingredients to help take you to greater heights.

we’ve armed the fourth generation of NO3 chrome with Nitrosigine, to help boost no levels, and promote better blood flow for longer lasting pumps.

why NO3 chrome? 

arginine Nitrate: provides a longer lasting pump, while reducing Nitrate tolerance. 

nitrosigine Arginine silicate: substantially increases no levels. 

citrulline Malate: supports muscular endurance to train harder and longer. 

grape seed extract: reduces swelling caused by injury and increases circulation.
feature_bullets: A Creatine and Stimulant Free Pump Amplifier

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
